p.strong: Note about the Functional Status Section

div.p: The Functional Status model used by the (Xt-EHR) European Patient Summary identifies, as part of that model, a set of assessment results that appear to be more appropriately represented by an Observation rather than by a ClinicalImpression.
However, Observation is not included among the allowed target resources for this section.

ul.li: in most cases this section is textual, and
further analysis is needed to increase the maturity of this section,

div.p: it has been agreed, for this version, to maintain conformance with the IPS.
Adopters should nevertheless be aware that this section may be subject to substantial changes in future versions.
